description.value: At 8th level, once per day as a standard action, you call forth an illusory fiend and order it to temporarily drag a living and sentient creature into an afterlife of pain and misery. This otherwise acts identically to @Compendium[pf1.spells.6efjgs1qvmj6yxqv]{Phantasmal Killer}, except targets that fail their Fortitude saving throws become paralyzed for a number of rounds equal to 1d4 + your inquisitor level instead of dying.
